actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A joint resolution to direct the Secretary of Agriculture to conduct an investigation and study of existing and potential methods of providing livestock and poultry insurance.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Agriculture to conduct an investigation and study of existing and potential methods of providing livestock and poultry insurance to producers. Requires a final report, with legislative recommendations, within 180 days of the date of enactment of this joint resolution.

titles.title: A joint resolution to direct the Secretary of Agriculture to conduct an investigation and study of existing and potential methods of providing livestock and poultry insurance.
